description: Analyzes Ultimate Oscillator readings across multiple timeframes (7, 14, 28 periods) to identify overbought conditions above 70 and oversold conditions below 30. Examines divergences and multi-timeframe confirmation for high-probability reversal signals in trending markets.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Ultimate Oscillator screening
Step 2: Get historical price data for multi-timeframe Ultimate Oscillator calculation
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for Ultimate Oscillator signal opportunities
Step 4: Calculate Ultimate Oscillator across timeframes and identify buy/sell signals with divergence analysis
Step 5: Rank signals by multi-timeframe confirmation and signal strength
